text: Lɨci 8.28 Mk 6.14-15, Lu 9.7-9 nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ abavɨmalɨ. Hɨhɨle nadɨ nɨman abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ. Nɨbu Jon kulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiakaiaka hɨsɨŋ kulaŋ agaŋ aba abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle nɨman abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ. Ha nɨbu Elaija aba abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle nɨman abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ. Ha nɨbu Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ igalakalaka hɨsɨŋ kulaŋ mu aha hɨsɨŋ agaŋ aba abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ.
